## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                         | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Should be activatble                | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | Label used for the tab button title | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `open`     | `open`     | Status of the tab                   | `boolean` | `undefined` |
